title: GENERAL PROVISIONS
description: Defines the subject matter scope definitions essential and important entities and application of NIS 2

title: COORDINATED CYBERSECURITY FRAMEWORKS
description: Establishes national cybersecurity strategies competent authorities CSIRTs and national cyber crisis management frameworks

title: COOPERATION AT UNION AND INTERNATIONAL LEVEL
description: Creates Cooperation Group CSIRTs network EU-CyCLONe and international cooperation mechanisms

title: POLICIES AND MANAGEMENT OF VULNERABILITIES
description: Mandates policies on cybersecurity of supply chains vulnerability disclosure and European vulnerability database

title: CYBERSECURITY RISK-MANAGEMENT AND REPORTING OBLIGATIONS
description: Defines corporate governance risk-management measures Article 21 reporting obligations Article 23 and information sharing

title: JURISDICTION AND REGISTRATION
description: Establishes jurisdiction rules registration requirements and Member State obligations for entity lists

title: SUPERVISION AND ENFORCEMENT
description: Sets out supervision regimes for essential vs important entities enforcement powers administrative fines and mutual assistance

title: DELEGATED AND IMPLEMENTING POWERS
description: Confers power to adopt delegated acts and implementing acts to the Commission

title: FINAL PROVISIONS
description: Covers Commission review transposition amendments to other regulations repeal of NIS 1 and entry into force
